comment: Initial contents for the UH Essentials database. For development purposes only.

contents.name: Campus Events
contents.description: A thread about events going on around campus. This includes library and bookstore hours, campus events, gym hours, etc.

contents.name: Commuting
contents.description: A thread about commuting to and from campus. Need directions about how to get somewhere? Drop your questions here!

contents.name: Degree Programs
contents.description: This thread contains questions regarding university degrees, majors, minors, classes, registration, etc.

contents.name: Food Services
contents.description: Anything and everything food related on campus!

contents.subject: Shuttle to BIOMED
contents.info: Is there a shuttle that goes to BIOMED from Gateway? I'm running a bit late to class.

contents.subject: ISO Calc I-IV textbook
contents.info: Anyone selling their calculus textbook? Bookstore only sells it with the myMathLab code (which we don't even need), and it's expensive.

contents.subject: Summer Registration
contents.info: When does registration for summer classes start?

contents.subject: NBA Preseason Game
contents.info: Looking for two tickets to the Clippers & Raptors game this Sunday (10/1)!!! LMK.

contents.subject: Free-to-use microwave?
contents.info: Is there a microwave that students can use for home lunch

contents.subject: Shuttle to the parking structure
contents.info: Is there are a shuttle that goes directly to the parking structure?
